price: 43. Kaadu too ceelalloola sinaamah tet naagure (baxxaqisna) edde yantifiqeenï gidah, kaadu teetil kas-kassowtam matan Yalla taaxigeeh, kay amri oggolta tu- taaxagó akke waytek.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-amthālu naḍribuhā lilnnāsi wamā yaʿqiluhā illā al-ʿālimūna
